modName: Portal To Hell - New World - Full Version 3.00
summary:
The Devil Himself Has Opened Up A Portal To His Kingdom Of Hell
Searching For A Warrior Brave Enough To Entertain Him By Slashing
Your Way Through His Mightiest Demons And Minions To Reep The Reward At The End.

v3.00 Now Has 6 Lands Of Hell To Explore.
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim Mod: Portal To Hell Full Version 3.00

The Devil Himself Has Opened Up A Portal To His Kingdom Of Hell
Searching For A Warrior Brave Enough To Entertain Him By Slashing
Your Way Through His Mightiest Demons And Minions To Reep The Rewards That Wait.

v3.00 Now Has 6 Lands Of Hell To Explore:
Dimension Added: Hells Realm Of Daedric Horror Level 1
Dimension Added: Hells Realm Of Daedric Horror Level 2
Dimension Added: Hells Realm Of Daedric Horror Level 3
Dimension Added: Hells Realm Of Werewolfs
Dimension Added: Hells Realm Of The Undead
Dimension Added: Hells Realm Of Dragon Priests

Alot Of Loot/Chests Have Been Added

The Portal Leading To Hell Is In Redorans Retreat Cave, Check Pic And Video For More Info.
There Is A Portal Leading Back To Skyrim At The End.
Enemies Respawn In Hell After A Certain Period Of Time.
Cool Effects And Custom Music Added For Total Immersion.

Made By SpiderMight

Installation:
Place PortalToHellFullVersion.esp And Music Folder In steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data
author: SpiderMight
